closed_reason: Added defensive null checks in submitClose function: shows error toast if currentTickId is null, guards against null button element, improved error handling for non-JSON responses. These changes ensure the function provides feedback instead of failing silently.
description: can't close tick from web ui, click close, confirm dialog with reason appears, but close button on confirm gets no action
notes: 2026-01-16 22:49 - Fixed by adding defensive null checks in submitClose(): (1) Shows error toast if currentTickId is null, (2) Guards against null button element, (3) Improves error handling for non-JSON responses. These changes ensure the function provides user feedback instead of failing silently.
title: close tick doesn't work
